brief_title: Metformin Add-on Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-020)(COMPLETED)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of an investigational drug in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
description: Pioglitazone 15 mg once daily, for patients not meeting specific glycemic goals during the placebo-controlled treatment period [Phase A], from Visit 5 (Week 6) to Visit 8 (Week 24)
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus
